attributes.action: Employers must reply to job applicant's
attributes.background: People find it difficult to even find a job taking people on day in day out , spending time filling out a job application to not hear anything back is disappointing

rejection.details: It is not clear in your petition what specific action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take on this subject. You could start a new petition calling on Parliament to pass a law to require employers to do this.
